Class DistanceCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dff.cordova.plugin.location.classes.DistanceCalculator

  • public class DistanceCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class calculate distance appropriate to two location: a start and an end locations.
    Since:
    12.12.2016

      • restore

        public void restore(android.content.Context context,
                    int type)
        Try to restore the distance property from the shared preference if are available
        Parameters:
        context - - The context of the application
        type - - The type of the request: 0 for fetching the total distance - 1 for the custom one.
